title: Saturday Special with Ethan Strauss and Duke Manyweather
itunes:title: Saturday Special with Ethan Strauss and Duke Manyweather
description:
In this exclusive podcast Colin first talks with Ethan Strauss of the Athletic and author of the new book 'The Victory Machine' which chronicles the rise and fall of the Warriors dynasty. They discuss why Kevin Durant will not be happy with the book and which personalities on the team meshed and which ones didn't


Colin then talks with Duke Manyweather, one of the most respected offensive line coaches in the country about what players on the o-line most impress him in the NFL. They also talk about all of the top prospects in the 2020 NFL draft and which ones he thinks will have the most immediate impact

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
